name: arboreta
description:
A quiet stroll through procedurally generated forests. Controls:

     To look around: Move the mouse
     To move: WASD or Arrow Keys
     To jump: Spacebar
     To run: Left Shift
     To drift: Stand on the trail and let go
     To exit: Hold ESC

Audio credits:

     Footsteps:
          Freesound user Montion_S
          Freesound user revolt 2563

     Field recordings:
          Luftrum
          Freesound user klankbeeld

     Music courtesy of Julia Escobar (with Dr. Ezra Bartz on piano)
